Online Application for Ontario University Admission Application 2024 into the Fall 2024 Entry of Ontario University (Current Ontario Secondary School 101 Application Type, and Undergrad 105 for International or Canadian Residents not currently attending an Ontario High School) is open for students who desire to enroll.

Students should take note of the following before applying.

Before Applying,

understand your eligibility (i.e. if you are eligible for Undergrad 101 or Undergrad 105).

When Applying,

Create an OUAC Account

Mark important application deadlines:

After Applying,

Log in to the website to review important information regarding your admission

 

Table of Contents

Ontario University Application Deadline for Fall 2024 Entry:

 

Online Application for Current Ontario Secondary (High) School Admission (101)

Who is Eligible to Apply?

  • Current Ontario high school students who want to gain admission into any universities that have specific programs of studies
  • Students who have received or expect to receive an Ontario Secondary School Diploma (OSSD) with six 4U/M courses at the end of the current year.
  • Also for a student who attended a postsecondary institution (college/university/career college) and wishes to apply
  • Students applying to the first year of an undergraduate degree program or diploma program at an Ontario university.
  • Students under the age of 21 years.

How to Apply Ontario University Admission Application for Fall 2024 Entry

You need Ontario Account to be able to apply for admission.

 

Create an OUAC Account

  • Go to Ontario Secondary School Application (101)
  • Create an OUAC Account
  • Visit your email to confirm account creation and set a password.

 

How to Login

  • Go to Ontario Secondary School Application (101)
  • Enter your Username and Password
  • Click login

How to Recover Password:

  • Go to Ontario Secondary School Application (101)
  • Enter your Ontario Account Username
  • Click Recover Password

How to Recover Username

  • Go to Ontario Secondary School Application (101)
  • Click recover username

 

Online Application Fees for Current Ontario High School 101 Applicant

  1. Base Application Fee: $150
  2. Additional Choice Fee: $50/choice
  3. International Service Fee: $10

If you are not a Canadian citizen or permanent resident (landed immigrant).

  1. Supplemental Program Fee
Institution Fee
McMaster University – Engineering $40
McMaster University – Integrated Biomedical Engineering & Health Sciences $40
OCAD University – All $25
University of Toronto – Architecture $45
University of Toronto – Commerce $50
The University of Toronto, Faculty of Arts & Science – Computer Science $50
University of Toronto – Engineering $40
University of Waterloo – Accounting $53.25
University of Waterloo – Engineering $53.25

Payment Options

  • Credit/Debit card (VISA, MasterCard, American Express, VISA Debit, or Debit MasterCard).
  • Online banking through selected Canadian banks and credit unions only. (This normally takes 2-5 business days to process.) You must make all payments in Canadian funds.
  • Flywire (for international payments only). You can pay the Canadian dollar fees in the currency of your choice. This may take 2-5 business days to process.

Ontario University Application Deadline for Fall 2024 Entry:

September 2024
